page.title: 05WADEBRIDGE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The{Industrial Estate}is on the northern side of the town at{Trenant {Vale}.Its position makes for easy vehicular access as it avoids the town centre congestion. The firms at present on the estate are -:Broad and Gibson(garage),Mac Ace(wet suits), Cox Electronics, Camel Glass, Quintrells(printers), Preci Spark (plastics), Richard Godden(vehicle repairs), Turners Cash and Carry (groceries), Bach Simpson(electronics) Menhennitt and Prior(electical),N.C.T. Dairy Services, O.G.A.L.(optical glass), Cornwall Farmers, Good fellow Clocks, Light Wave(surf boards), Morse (upholsterer), Kernow Metal Products, St Minver Pine(furniture), Pictures (framers) and Mewtons(gas cylinder storage)
